text: The library's top floor is usually quiet and has a great view!
I have a calculus textbook in good condition to give away. Any takers?
I start with past papers and then form study groups to cover tough topics.
Clear communication and defined roles from the start can really help!
There's a taco truck on 5th Street that offers a student lunch special.
